title: CROSS POCKET MELANGE PANT BROWN
description: Fashioned from luxurious blend of premium cotton and stretch materials, these melange pants offer a refined take on the timeless Chino. The slim cut ensures a closer fit to the body, with a slender profile through the leg and a gracefully tapered hem. Intricately detailed with premium stitching, a sophisticated front button closure, and back flap pockets, these pants exude elevated style.
